item.title: Poetry on demand?
item.description:
I usually have to feel something to write a little poem thing. But i thought id try and have a go, at writing poetry without being inspired..

I’m a little bit tired but ill… ill :/ Well this is no good, I’ve ran out of words, should i sit down and scribble or eat lemon curd?

Oh wait! Im in the office, time to get back to work!
